alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 10:20AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY THIS MORNING... HAZARDS...The combination of a band of heavy snow and winds gusting to 55 mph is producing BLIZZARD conditions. Visibility within the band is ZERO. Many roads are likely impassable. DO NOT attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1018 AM EST, a band of heavy snow covered the northern half of Jefferson county from about Watertown and Fort Drum north to the St Lawrence River. This band is expected to remain nearly stationary through noon. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Clayton, Dexter, Glen Park, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Sackets Harbor, Philadelphia, Brownville, Alexandria Bay, Theresa, Cape Vincent, Antwerp, Chaumont, Evans Mills, Three Mile Bay, Millen Bay, La Fargeville and Perch Lake. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 48 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Travel is nearly impossible in this area with blizzard conditions. &&
